about.title: About me
about.aboutDescriptionPart1: After graduating with a degree in Management, I decided to pursue my passion for programming full-stack web development. My favorite part of programming is the problem-solving aspect. I love the feeling of finally figuring out a solution to a problem. My core stack is React, Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. I am also familiar with TypeScript and Prisma, and I hold a React.js certificate from
about.aboutDescriptionPart2: . I am currently looking for a full-time position as a software developer. When I'm not coding, I enjoy playing video games, watching movies, and playing with my dog. I also enjoy learning new things. I am currently learning about history and philosophy. I'm also learning how to play the guitar.

adminDashboard.title: AdminDashboard
adminDashboard.description: I created this admin dashboard as a pet project to improve my UI skills.

devFlowApp.title: DevFlow App
devFlowApp.description: A full stack web platform for asking questions about coding problems and sharing solutions. Built with React, Next.js, MongoDB and Tailwind.

modernLanding.title: Modern Landing Web Page
modernLanding.description: I created this landing page to improve my UI/UX skills.

wordanalyticsClone.title: Word Analytics Clone
wordanalyticsClone.description: A clone of wordanalytics.com. I built this to improve my front-end skills and learn more about Next.js server actions.

rmtdevClone.title: rmtDev Clone
rmtdevClone.description: Job board for remote developer jobs. Built with React, Node.js, MongoDB and advanced filtering functionality.

corpcommentClone.title: CorpComment Clone
corpcommentClone.description: A full-stack web application that allows employees to give feedback about companies anonymously.

wordanalyticsClone.title: Word Analytics Clone
wordanalyticsClone.description: A web app for text analysis and SEO optimization. Processes text in real-time.

rmtdevClone.title: Rmtdev Clone
rmtdevClone.description: Job board for remote developer jobs. Users can filter by various criteria.

corpcommentClone.title: CorpComment Clone
corpcommentClone.description: A platform for anonymous company reviews. Features a real-time feed.
